content.text:
{"translationLines":[{"lineNumber":94841,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あん？　どうした、シーラ」","translatedEnglishLine":"'Huh? What's wrong, Sheila?'"},
{"lineNumber":94842,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ぐすっ、ら、ランス様……」","translatedEnglishLine":"'Sniff, L-Lance-sama...'"},{"lineNumber":94843,"originalJapaneseLine":"「がははは、俺が離れるのが悲しいのか」","translatedEnglishLine":"'Gahaha, are you sad that I'm leaving?'"},{"lineNumber":94844,"originalJapaneseLine":"「なーに安心しろ、俺が結婚したって","translatedEnglishLine":"'Relax, even if I get married...'"},{"lineNumber":94845,"originalJapaneseLine":"　別に今までと何が変わるでもない」","translatedEnglishLine":"'Nothing will really change from how things have been so far.'"},
{"lineNumber":94846,"originalJapaneseLine":"「え、と……今までと、変わら、ない……」","translatedEnglishLine":"'Uh, so... nothing will change...?'"},
{"lineNumber":94847,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そうそう、今後は奴隷兼大統領に、","translatedEnglishLine":"'Yeah, that's right. From now on I'll have a slave and president,'"},
{"lineNumber":94848,"originalJapaneseLine":"　兼愛人もつくってだけだな。","translatedEnglishLine":"'and also a mistress. That's about it.'"},
{"lineNumber":94849,"originalJapaneseLine":"　これからも可愛がってやるぞー","translatedEnglishLine":"'I'll keep treating you with affection!'"},{"lineNumber":94850,"originalJapaneseLine":"「がははははははは！」","translatedEnglishLine":"'Gahahahahahahaha!'"},{"lineNumber":94851,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"'........'"},
{"lineNumber":94852,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ、はい、それなら」","translatedEnglishLine":"'Ah, okay, then...'"},{"lineNumber":94853,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うわああああああああ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"'Waaaaahhhhhhh!'"},{"lineNumber":94854,"originalJapaneseLine":"「きゃっ！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"'Eek!?'"},{"lineNumber":94855,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"'........'"},
{"lineNumber":94856,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うわ、リアル……","translatedEnglishLine":"'Wow, so realistic...'"},{"lineNumber":94857,"originalJapaneseLine":"　てか、絶対に言う……」","translatedEnglishLine":"'No, I'm definitely going to say it...'"},{"lineNumber":94858,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ねえねえ、さっきからどうしたの？」","translatedEnglishLine":"'Hey, hey, what's wrong with you since a while ago?'"},
{"lineNumber":94859,"originalJapaneseLine":"「いや……」","translatedEnglishLine":"'Well...'"},{"lineNumber":94860,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あんたって……","translatedEnglishLine":"'You know...'"},{"lineNumber":94861,"originalJapaneseLine":"　幸せになれない女なんだなって……」","translatedEnglishLine":"'You’re a woman who can’t be happy...'"},{"lineNumber":94862,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ええっ……？」","translatedEnglishLine":"'Ehh...?'"},{"lineNumber":94863,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ペルエレがいて、国の為の仕事が出来て……","translatedEnglishLine":"'With Peruelere here, and work for the country that you can do...'"},{"lineNumber":94864,"originalJapaneseLine":"　周りには皆がいて……","translatedEnglishLine":"'Everyone is around you...'"},{"lineNumber":94865,"originalJapaneseLine":"「今、私、とっても幸せだよ？」","translatedEnglishLine":"'Right now, I am really happy, you know?'"},
{"lineNumber":94866,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"'........'"},
{"lineNumber":94867,"originalJapaneseLine":"（そうか……）","translatedEnglishLine":"(I see...)"},{"lineNumber":94868,"originalJapaneseLine":"（こいつはもう幸せだから、","translatedEnglishLine":"(She's already happy,"},{"lineNumber":94869,"originalJapaneseLine":"　幸せを掴みにいく必要がないのか）","translatedEnglishLine":"so she doesn't need to go after happiness.)"},{"lineNumber":94870,"originalJapaneseLine":"（むしろ、奪われてるんじゃなくて……","translatedEnglishLine":"(Rather than being robbed of it...)"},{"lineNumber":94871,"originalJapaneseLine":"　周りに分け与えた方が幸せになれるのか）","translatedEnglishLine":"maybe sharing it with others makes her happier.)"},{"lineNumber":94872,"originalJapaneseLine":"（…………）","translatedEnglishLine":"(........)"},
{"lineNumber":94873,"originalJapaneseLine":"（でも、それって幸福と言えるのか……","translatedEnglishLine":"(But, can that really be called happiness...)"},{"lineNumber":94874,"originalJapaneseLine":"　う、ううん……）","translatedEnglishLine":"N-no...)"},{"lineNumber":94875,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"'........'"},
{"lineNumber":94876,"originalJapaneseLine":"「いや、まあ、シーラが不幸のどん底に","translatedEnglishLine":"'Well, even if Sheila falls into the depths of misery,"},{"lineNumber":94877,"originalJapaneseLine":"　落ちても私にはどうでもいいんだけどね……」","translatedEnglishLine":"it really doesn't matter to me...'"},{"lineNumber":94878,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ええっ！？　私、落ちるの！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"'Ehh!? I'm going to fall!?'"},{"lineNumber":94879,"originalJapaneseLine":"「今日という今日は我慢の限界！","translatedEnglishLine":"'Today is the last straw!'"},{"lineNumber":94880,"originalJapaneseLine":"　あんたちょっとこっち来なさい！」","translatedEnglishLine":"'You, come over here right now!'"},{"lineNumber":94881,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あーん、ダーリーーーン。","translatedEnglishLine":"'Aahn, darliiiing.'"},{ "lineNumber":94882,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ゼスの田舎王女がリアを苛めるよー","translatedEnglishLine":"'The country princess of Zeth is bullying Ria!'"},{"lineNumber":94883,"originalJapaneseLine":"「むきーーーーっ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"'Grrr!'"},{"lineNumber":94884,"originalJapaneseLine":"「まったく、お前らは……」","translatedEnglishLine":"'Honestly, you guys...!'"},
{"lineNumber":94885,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスの部屋でリアとマジックが","translatedEnglishLine":"In Lance's room, Ria and Magic were..."},{"lineNumber":94886,"originalJapaneseLine":"お馴染みの喧嘩をしていた。","translatedEnglishLine":"having their usual quarrel."},{"lineNumber":94887,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ふふ、賑やかですね。","translatedEnglishLine":"'Hehe, it’s lively, isn’t it?'"},{"lineNumber":94888,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ランス様、洗濯物を取り込んできました」","translatedEnglishLine":"'Lance-sama, I brought in the laundry.'"},
{"lineNumber":94889,"originalJapaneseLine":"「んー、ご苦労。","translatedEnglishLine":"'Hmm, thanks for your hard work.'"},
{"lineNumber":94890,"originalJapaneseLine":"　適当にその辺置いとけ」","translatedEnglishLine":"Just put it somewhere around here for now.'"}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「がははは、俺が離れるのが悲しいのか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: 'Gahaha, are you sad that I'm leaving?'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「なーに安心しろ、俺が結婚したって
別に今までと何が変わるでもない」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: 'Nothing will really change from how things have been so far.'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そうそう、今後は奴隷兼大統領に、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: 'Yeah, that's right. From now on I'll have a slave and president,'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 兼愛人もつくってだけだな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: 'and also a mistress. That's about it.'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: これからも可愛がってやるぞー

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: 'No, I'm definitely going to say it...'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ねえねえ、さっきからどうしたの？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: 'Hey, hey, what's wrong with you since a while ago?'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 幸せになれない女なんだなって……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: 'You’re a woman who can’t be happy...'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ペルエレがいて、国の為の仕事が出来て……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: 'With Peruelere here, and work for the country that you can do...'
'Right now, I am really happy, you know?'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 幸せを掴みにいく必要がないのか）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: so she doesn't need to go after happiness.)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （むしろ、奪われてるんじゃなくて……
周りに分け与えた方が幸せになれるのか）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: maybe sharing it with others makes her happier.)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （でも、それって幸福と言えるのか……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (But, can that really be called happiness...)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いや、まあ、シーラが不幸のどん底に
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: 'Well, even if Sheila falls into the depths of misery,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 落ちても私にはどうでもいいんだけどね……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: it really doesn't matter to me...'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「今日という今日は我慢の限界！
あんたちょっとこっち来なさい！」
ゼスの田舎王女がリアを苛めるよー
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: 'The country princess of Zeth is bullying Ria!'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスの部屋でリアとマジックが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In Lance's room, Ria and Magic were...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お馴染みの喧嘩をしていた。
ランス様、洗濯物を取り込んできました」
適当にその辺置いとけ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Just put it somewhere around here for now.'

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English
